<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Profile</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/user/me"}></MethodEndpoint>



Updates the current user's personal profile information.  

This request supports four optional request body parameters, which you can see in the JSON example below:
```
{
  "defaultRoleId": "",
  "firstName": "",
  "lastName": "",
  "timeZone": "",  
}
```

The red **required** labels in the request body schema below apply only when you create a new user profile, so the labels don't apply to this request.


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>

Model containing user profile

</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accessKeysAllowed"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Access keys allowed","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"defaultRoleId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Default Role ID","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"email"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Email ID","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"firstName"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"First name. Maximum length is 300 characters.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"lastName"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Last name.  Maximum length is 300 characters.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"roleIds"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Role IDs","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timeZone"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Time zone (e.g. America/Los_Angeles)","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

empty_user_profile_provided / missing_first_name / missing_time_zone / invalid_time_zone / user_inactive_or_not_exist / default_role_not_belonging_to_user_role_list / invalid_user_role

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"403"} value={"403"}><div>

cannot_disable_own_profile / access_keys_cannot_update_owner_profile

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
